arts.ttl: Robin Hack's double propels Borussia Mönchengladbach to commanding victory in Heidenheim
arts.sum: Robin Hack scored twice as Borussia Mönchengladbach continued their impressive away form with a convincing 3-0 victory over Heidenheim. Gladbach arrived at the Voith-Arena looking to continue their impressive away form, having won their last two Bundesliga matches on the road.

arts.ttl: Heidenheim vs. Gladbach preview: Can the hosts end their winless run?
arts.sum: Heidenheim will attempt to end their seven-game winless league run when they play host to Borussia Mönchengladbach in Saturday’s Bundesliga clash.

arts.ttl: Preview: Heidenheim vs. Borussia Monchengladbach - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Heidenheim and Borussia Monchengladbach, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
